name: Red-GitHubBot
description: GitHub bot which helps out on Red-DiscordBot's repository.

GH_APP_ID.description: GitHub App ID. You can find it in app's settings at https://github.com/settings/apps

GH_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: GitHub webhook secret. You can use `python -c "print(__import__('secrets').token_hex(32))"` to generate it. You will need this later to create a webhook in GitHub app.

GH_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Private key for your GitHub app. You can generate one at the bottom of your app's settings at https://github.com/settings/apps

SENTRY_DSN.description: Sentry client key (DSN). You can find it in the 'Client Keys (DSN)' page in the Sentry project's settings.
